Description:
Detects potential overwriting and deletion of a file using DD.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research), MSTIC
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DD File Overwrite
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path = '/bin/dd' or process_path = '/usr/bin/dd') and command like '%of=%' and (command like '%if=/dev/zero%' or command like '%if=/dev/null%'))
